# NETWORK::NETWORK_APPLY_PED_SCAR_DATA

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT** characterSlot

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Applies current saved scar data to ped with PED_INDEX PedIndex
